channel.title: Idlewild on mattischrome

item.title: Understated Classics #7: 100 Broken Windows by Idlewild
item.description: Idewild are a solid band who have released four or five albums that I could consider for this series. I’m even in the sleeve credits of one: Post-Electric Blues, if you’re asking. In the end I went for 100 Broken Windows because it means a lot to me. It has more of a place in my life than the others. Usually I find that this happens if I can remember where I bought an album.
